dcterms:description: The Dynamic Gym benchmark is used to evaluate the performance of the Triple-Q algorithm in a continuous state and action space environment, where a point agent navigates to reach a goal while avoiding hazardous areas.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Gym benchmark

dcterms:creator: Yinlam Chow
Oﬁr Nachum
Edgar Duenez-Guzman
Mohammad Ghavamzadeh
dcterms:description: The Grid-world environment is used to evaluate the Triple-Q algorithm in a tabular setting, where the agent must navigate to a destination while avoiding obstacles, with a cost constraint on hitting obstacles.
dcterms:title: Grid-world environment
